description:
Just the right balance of grip, glide and durability, regardless of the temperature. The Universal plush is made of nylon for optimum versatility and durability. The Splitboard+ skins features an asymmetrical tip and tail connection for a perfect fit on your board.

  • Made of durable and versatile nylon fibres
  • 18cm of adjustability for a perfect fit
  • Updated tail connectors now feature a cam for improved retention
  • Tip connectors are asymmetrical to provide the best hold on your board
  • Precut straight edge aligns with your board out of the box
  • Removable RipStrip makes pulling apart skins easier, and can be removed for added traction in case of adhesion contamination
  • PFC-free hydrophobic water treatment prevents ice clumping
  • Refined non-toxic adhesive is functional to -30°C
  • Trimming tool included for precise and easy skin fitting
name: G3 Splitboard+ Universal Skins
